Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Name of the user that is used to execute the job.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Project in which the job is executed

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The site root to which URLs are relative. By default this is "/"

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The requested URI set in the context used when the job is executed. By default it is "/".

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The locale set in the context used when the job is executed. By default it is "en".

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The character encoding set in the request context used to execute the job. By default it is "UTF-8"

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The remote address set in the request context used to execute the job. By default it is "127.0.0.1".
